channel.title: Brokenangel Development Team
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://www.brokenangel.org/Themes/goodtheme/images/theme/mylogo.png[/img][/center]
[b][size=12pt]Brokenangel Development[/size][/b]
-Server already has a vps -Server already has a domain -Server already has a Webhost
[b]Plans for Development[/b]: -Fix the combat method for ATLEAST 95% perfect combat/switching -Create a good economy -Make the server stable -Have a good player base -No bugs/glitches or dupes
[b]About the server:[/b] Server Name: Brokenangel Base: Project Insanity
[b]All the updates so far:[/b] [code]Fixed byte[] Memory Leak Fixed the last dupe(Cheat Engine) - Says in Server console if a person is trying to dupe. Intergrated the server with webserver Mysql [center]-Auto Vote -Highscores -Kdr Highscores [Kill/death] ratio[/center] Added new curses - fully working 100% Fixed up alot of the code for added stabality added ::kdr Made home In edgeville Added Pkp shop Added slayer shop Added super donator Added extreme donator Added overloads Lots more,but I am more concerned with the stuff that is yet to be done.[/code]
Future updates: [code]Auto donation system Increase stability Fix bugs Change the way the combat algorithm works Add some more things for people to do
[/code]
[b]Media[/b]:
More coming soon
[img]http://www.brokenangel.org/Pictures/Untitled1.png[/img] [img]http://www.brokenangel.org/Pictures/vote.png[/img] [img]http://www.brokenangel.org/Pictures/kdrboards.png[/img]
[b]Open places on the development team:[/b]:
[code]Programmers/Coders - Vodka,[slot],[slot]
Website Designer - Vodka, [slot] - Already have a website with SMF forums set up and highscores/kdr highscores and auto vote, But I'm no expert web developer,so I need someone expierenced in that.
Video Maker/Editor - [slot], [slot]
GFX designer - [slot],[slot][/code]
[b]How to apply for a position:[/b]
[code]Name: Age: Position you are applying for: How experienced are you in the position you are applying for? Post some examples of your work, or what you have been working on: Are you experienced with any of the 3 following languages: Java,Php,HTML What is your msn? :[/code]

item.title: Brokenangel Development Team
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

[quote=“brok3nangel, post:10, topic:395741”]Auto donation is now added, Jamie and prededor I have added you both so msn as I’m intrested in you being on the development team.

Mark, Welcome to the team

and Bump

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=492931.msg3604802#msg3604802 date=1306005175]

OMFG, this is a project insanity??? This is far by the best I have seen lol
[/quote]I just see dspk with tutorials to be honest. What else can you show?

Theres a whole lot in the background you cannot see, I have completely rewriten the combat algorithm now, fixed stability and memory leaks, and fixed all dupes.

Dont judge a book by its cover Also,Miasmics is going to be added in the near future,which not very many 317 servers have ;P[/quote]
when did you add me on msn :S?

Read full topic

item.description:
@brok3nangel wrote:

[center]

-Server already has a vps
-Server already has a domain
-Server already has a Webhost

Plans for Development:
-Fix the combat method for ATLEAST 95% perfect combat/switching
-Create a good economy
-Make the server stable
-Have a good player base

About the server:
Server Name: Brokenangel
Base: Project Insanity

All the updates so far:

Fixed byte[] Memory Leak Fixed the last dupe(Cheat Engine) - Says in Server console if a person is trying to dupe. Intergrated the server with webserver Mysql [center]-Auto Vote -Highscores -Kdr Highscores [Kill/death] ratio[/center] Added new curses - fully working 100% Fixed up alot of the code for added stabality added ::kdr Made home In edgeville Added Pkp shop Added slayer shop Added super donator Added extreme donator Added overloads Lots more,but I am more concerned with the stuff that is yet to be done.

Future updates:

Increase stability

Add some more things for people to do

More coming soon
